reviews.sentence: A perfect choice in Milano. Quiet location not far from the center this hotel proposes large and clean rooms perfect bathrooms and a good breakfast. Very friendly efficient and mulitiligual staff. Public transportation next door and underground car park.

Highly Recommend this Hotel. Stayed at the Radison Blu from June 4 June 7 we came to Milan for a few nice days of shopping and sightseeing. came to the Hotel by car there are a few parking spaces outside of the hotel but most of the time they are all occupied. The hotel also offers a Parking garage for around 20 Euros per day which is a reasonable price for Milan. We booked a Business Class Room it was very nice clean modern the bed was very comfy the room had a nice view the bathroom was very nice with a bathtub and a separate shower. We did have one problem the Shower was a little clogged and the water always ran out but other than that everything else was greatAl amenities that you would need were there. The room was a good size for Italy. Breakfast was very good so many choices of great food. The area is not the best but for us that did not really matter. The tram is a few feet away that will bring you to the city center in about 20 25 minutes it is a very cheap way to get there. With a Taxi you will pay around 20 Euro. Staff is overall very friendly and very helpfulCheck in Check Out very quick. No problems Liked this hotel a lot. Hope to be back very soon.

Great value good position too. Very good hotel secure parking helpful staff. Rooms very modern and exceeded expectation. All staff we encountered we excellent Just a few metres from a tram stop taking us right to the Duomo for one euro fifty. Hotel exceeded expectations. Easy tram ride into centre with all Milan has too offer. it is an expensive city though. Breakfast too expensive.

Beautiful hotel. I think the hotel is somehow new since we have stayed here last May 2014. Love the room neat and clean. But the hotel is far from the city centre and groceries or any of that kind is never to be seen around you have to walk for like 20 minutes to reach the nearest store. But overall we are satisfied with the service. The hotel is also near in the park where you can roam around. Italians are very nice and warm to tourists.

Good very good. Very comfortable hotel and very good conditionsbreakfast very good sauna is good and little far away city central ned to 15 min with taxi but generally very good only need 20 euro for daily park.

decent hotel. Rented two rooms and both bathrooms suffered from blocked drains. Would take a shower and be standing in a massive pool of water which overflowed to the floor. Sink also overflowed. Called front desk and they said it was piping in the building which was blocked. Was here seven months ago. Reported and still same issue. No bathrobes so had to be fully dressed to walk to the pool spa sauna. Lots of free parking outside the hotel and close to tram and bus stations. 20 mins to get into city centre.

It is about the little things. We just stayed 3 nights at the Radison blue in Milan. We booked with ebokers as the Radison page crashed 3 times when I tried to book in the office. So the first downer was you do n’t get Carlson Rewards as it seams not to be the nights you stay but where you book. Other chains do n’t do that and frankly speaking that might be for us a point why we would prefer another chain with our next booking. In general we had a nice stay and we where lucky enough to be able to park in front of the hotel on the 3 3stret so we saved the 20Euros the hotel is charging for parking per night. We got a room on the eight floor 82 with a nice view. It was nice spacy and very clean even for my wife which is picky about it. Still it is about the little things I believe which make it from good to great. As in most hotel rooms the bathroom is the critical part also here I recommend to the housekeeping manager to have a seat on the toilet and look at what the guest sees. Check the photo … I noticed the toilet brush was clean and new and also the toilet seat was clean but due to usage the plastic turned yellow and looks “ yaki ”. The bathroom door needs also a fix as in the lower parts the paint is coming of. Bed nice but hard for me and ok for my wife … you can never please everybody I loved the hard pillow and my wife didn’t. Elevator be warned these are the slowest elevator doors ever. I hit myself almost every day as I am just used to the doors to open faster and maybe with less noise too. Breakfast nice choice well presented and a pretty good coffee I sayHot food was more or less cold which is a known problem but still annoying. I would also recommend to take the bacon apart before frying or baking it would be not sticking together and could actually turn crisp. Service nice and friendlyjust to make a note if a customer is asking for a clean spoon do n’t explain him it is only a water spot and start a discussion just bring a fresh spoon say you are sorry and get on with your day.

Great hotel. Really helpful staff easy parking in secure car park great room. little way out from city centre in residential area. but good transport links trams etc 1 minute away and if you are brave enough 15 minute drive to city centre and all the sites lots of carparks Again you will need to be brave and have good spacial awareness.

Great hotel. Really helpful staff easy parking in secure car park great room. little way out from city centre in residential area. but good transport links trams etc 1 minute away and if you are brave enough 15 minute drive to city centre and all the sites lots of carparks Again you will need to be brave and have good spacial awareness.

A little bit away from the old city but a nice place to stay. This is a great relatively new hotel but it is away from the main attractions. I left my rental car in the hotel garage and on the recommendation of the hotel desk staff took bus 57 which was a 20 minute ride right to the core. We had a nice sized suite on an upper floor with all the amenities. The hotel staff were friendly helpful and all spoke excellent English.

5 Star hotel just outside of the City Centre. If you are not that bothered about location this is the hotel is great. The hotel is some 20 mins out of the city centre however there is a tram and bus service that runs from practically outside the hotel front door making access easy and convenient. The leisure facilities are great as are the staff who were very welcoming and helpful during our stay. The hotel decor and theme is beautiful. The room was spacious and the bathroom had a powerful shower as well as full size bath. Some rooms have a small balcony over looking the hotel garden which is a bonus if you are a smoker. The hotel offers parking but it is at a cost. 25Euros i believe but we chose to park for free on the main road which was fine.

Wonderful. It was a really nice hotel with friendly and supportive staff. Good location and nice pool. Though the view was not so great given that it is the middle of the city it was a nice hotel. The junior suite was spacious and comfortable. The bathrooms were fantastic and spacious. Breakfast was excellent as well with a lot of varieties. The parking was a bit odd. You have to check in before you can drive to the underground parking. Without the room key card you can not open the door to the garage and the garage is at least 150 m from the hotel reception. it is not so clearly marked and if you reach late in the evening like we did could be a bit confusing.

Super profesionel service at check in. We choose this hotel because of the very good value for money. You get very large rooms and nice bathrooms at a reasonable medium price. The receptionist welcomed us with a super profesionel check in and very friendly service. All our questions were answered very satisfactory Parking is free on the street outside and parking at the hotels underground garage is only 20 Euro per dayTransport to the city centre is easy by rail tram no 12 or bus no 57 in 20 minutes. Tickets are sold at the hotel reception very convenient.

Everything is ok the hotel is nice the rooms are clean friendly stuff. The food is excellent tasty. Parking is arranged near the hotel. I propose more foreign television programs because in most cases they are only Italian.

Disappointing breakfast. Stayed here for 3 nights last week. Overall not bad but definitely areas to improve. Checkin reasonably smooth quick. Room we had a room on the 9th floor. Spacious comfy king sized bed. Nice bathroom work separate shower. Basic toiletries. We got some compliments satsumas a bottle of water on day 2. Decent tea coffee selection provided. Gym pool spa clean open till 11 pm. Plenty of towels. They have separate steam sauna in male female changing room. The pool is decent size but they do need some more lighting in there as it is very dark after sunset. Breakfast biggest disappointment. Poor selection for a supposed four star hotel. They had 4 hot items only with scrambled eggs in 2 trays. They will prepare omelettes for you. there is a decent bakery selection the fresh orange juice was excellent. The staff were all friendly. Wifi free through outParking € 20 night in the car park or free parking on the road outside.

Pool. Pool was nice. Rooms are acceptable but carpark is really expensive. About 15 20 mins to the center. the hotel is indeed quite good for a business trip in the area. Staff is friendly for your reqirements.

Good but it takes time to get to the city center. Quite a spacious room clean. Friendly stuff. Parking in a reasonable price. Really good breakfast. Far from city center. No iron in the room. It would be nice if they offer in room water in glass bottles. They advertise themselves as a green hotel but if they really want to be such a hotel they should reduce use of plastic.

Pleasant. For the price I paid the room was up to the mark. Off street private parking was a good facility although slightly on the expensive side. Small things such as not enough enough lights in the room. Coffee maker and Tea kettle had no access to electrical points. TV was not working properly.

Pleasant. Modern with beautiful bar. Room was big with comfy bed small double. There were many hidden costs. I would n’t recommend to pay for parking as there is plenty free space all around the hotel. In room dinning was horrible tasteless food. Do n’t waste your money. Would n’t stay there again.

Nice place clean good experience. A nice modern and large bedroom very well decorated a bathroom very clean. A good location only 15 min to the city by train. Tha parking is very usefulSpa area is very smalThe bar has a good atmosphere.
Excellent. The lication was great it also had a parking for the guests. The bathroom was not so clean. Even thought the parking belonged to the hotel you still had to pay it.

Below average. The staff was friendly. The location is far from the center. Unfortunately you have to pay for everything. Even parking which is kind of illogical as i am staying in the hotel and paid a lot for the room. Breakfast is the same everyday and omlete was tasteless.
Wonderful. The best breakfast and very friendly staff. Very little free parking near by and paid parking is expensive.

Wonderful. Enough parking space. though hard to find the entrance Nice and helpful staf Nice breakfast Large room with nice bathroom and adequate facilities Free access to the pol A little bit too far from the city Room door hard to open with room key.

Great hotel with an excellent pool and facilities located a little out of the city centre. Breakfast has a good selection of items at first glance it seemed like it was just cereals fruits juices croissants hot drinks and toast but when you sat down there ws a menu for cooked items that were also part of the breakfast buffet. My children enjoyed the pancakes with nutela and my husbands omlete was made to order. The pasta gifts in the the room were a lovely touch. TV in room was fixed to the wall so you could not plug in any USB devices of your own which many travellers do these days. you will need a car if you stay at this hotel as it is aruond 25 minutes away from the city centre and taxis could get expensive not sure how far away it is from the nearest tube Parking should have been free for hotel guests especially given the lack of free street parking in the surrounding roads.

Very nice place cozy rooms tasty pizza warm staff. The check in was fast. In front of the hotel it was possible to park a car for a whilethe only one minus is a draft beer. They serve only one local brand 75euro per 04l.
